title: Seth Savoy’s “Echo Boomers”
description:
Director Seth Savoy’s rip-roaring debut feature film Echo Boomers follows a group of privileged but indebted and underemployed millennials as they tear across Chicago, pillaging and destroying homes of the rich. The movie is actually inspired by real events — and Seth’s quest to “smuggle social commentary” into mainstream action movies.

Watch the trailer for Echo Boomers

Follow Seth on Instagram
